an2.115:1: "Bhikkhus, the taints do not increase for twokinds of persons. What two? One who perceives what is non-Dhamma as non-Dhamma and one who perceives what is Dhamma as Dhamma.[n.34] Here, again, I followCeand Ee over Be, which inverts the clauses.The taints do not increase for these twokinds of persons."
